TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.subtitle: Please read our terms and conditions carefully

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using our restaurant reservation system, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.content: Our platform provides online restaurant reservation services. We facilitate connections between customers and participating restaurants for table bookings.

userResponsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: Users are responsible for providing accurate information when making reservations. You must arrive on time for your reservation and notify the restaurant of any changes or cancellations.

reservationPolicy.title: 4. Reservation Policy
reservationPolicy.content: Reservations are subject to availability and restaurant policies. We reserve the right to cancel or modify reservations in case of unforeseen circumstances.

privacyPolicy.title: 5. Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy. Your personal information will be used solely for reservation purposes and will not be shared with third parties without your consent.

limitations.title: 6. Limitations of Liability
limitations.content: Our liability is limited to the extent permitted by law. We are not responsible for any issues that may arise during your dining experience at the restaurant.

modifications.title: 7. Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website.

contact.title: 8. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at legal@restaurant-manager.com

agreement.checkbox: I have read and agree to the Terms of Service
agreement.required: You must accept the Terms of Service to continue
